requirement_tested: A frontend application that fetches all data from backend APIs
user_persona: A curious food enthusiast exploring new dining options.
user_goal: Browse the latest restaurant listings fetched dynamically from the backend.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Maya opens the culinary guide app and expects to see a list of restaurants loaded from the server.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage URL in browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Homepage renders with restaurant cards populated dynamically from backend API.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Restaurant Details
narrative_steps.description: Maya sees several restaurant cards and clicks one to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a restaurant card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigates to the restaurant's detailed view page, which loads data via backend API call.

requirement_tested: A backend application that connects to a PostgreSQL database using environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp
user_persona: A developer deploying the backend service locally.
user_goal: Ensure the backend connects successfully to the PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: The developer sets up the environment variables and starts the backend server.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` in the backend directory after setting environment variables.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server initializes successfully and establishes a connection to PostgreSQL using the provided credentials.

requirement_tested: Real-time display of restaurant and recipe information
user_persona: A frequent diner wanting instant updates on restaurant availability.
user_goal: Receive live updates on restaurant changes without refreshing the page.

narrative_steps.title: Enabling Live Updates
narrative_steps.description: Alex notices the 'Live Updates' badge and wants real-time notifications.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Enable Live Updates' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: WebSocket connection is established, and live updates begin appearing automatically.

narrative_steps.title: Receiving Real-Time Update
narrative_steps.description: Alex observes a restaurant card updating in real time.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for a restaurant update event from the server.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Restaurant card reflects updated information instantly without manual reload.

user_persona: A traveler looking for places to eat near their current location.
user_goal: Find restaurants close to their current geographical position.

narrative_steps.title: Requesting Location Access
narrative_steps.description: Jamie wants to discover nearby restaurants based on her actual location.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Find My Location' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Browser prompts for geolocation permission; upon granting, nearby restaurants load.

requirement_tested: Search functionality for finding specific recipes
user_persona: A home cook preparing dinner tonight.
user_goal: Quickly find a vegetarian pasta recipe under 30 minutes.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Search Query
narrative_steps.description: Sam types 'pasta' into the search bar and applies filters.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'pasta' into the search box and select 'Vegetarian' and '<30 min' filters.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Filtered list of matching recipes updates immediately below the search bar.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Search
narrative_steps.description: Sam presses Enter to finalize the search query.
narrative_steps.action: Press Enter key in the search field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Backend returns filtered results, displayed in a grid layout with thumbnails.

requirement_tested: Ability to view user reviews and ratings for restaurants and recipes
user_persona: A cautious diner researching restaurant quality.
user_goal: Read what others think about a particular restaurant before visiting.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Reviews Tab
narrative_steps.description: Taylor navigates to a restaurant's detail page and checks out reviews.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to restaurant detail page and click the 'Reviews' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tab displays average star rating and chronological list of individual user reviews.

requirement_tested: Ability for users to add their own reviews and ratings
user_persona: An active community member sharing dining experiences.
user_goal: Share his experience by leaving a review and rating for a recently visited restaurant.

narrative_steps.title: Writing a Review
narrative_steps.description: Jordan fills out the review form after dining at a new place.
narrative_steps.action: Select 4 stars and write a short review in the text area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Star selection highlights and text input captures Jordan's feedback.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Review
narrative_steps.description: Jordan submits the review hoping it appears instantly.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit Review' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New review is appended to the list without reloading the page.

requirement_tested: UI styled with lemon chiffon background and chocolate-colored components
user_persona: A designer verifying visual consistency of the app.
user_goal: Confirm that UI follows the prescribed color scheme throughout the application.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Background Color
narrative_steps.description: Casey examines the overall look of the app for correct background hue.
narrative_steps.action: Open homepage and inspect global background style.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Background color matches lemon chiffon (#FFFACD) as defined in theme.css.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Component Styling
narrative_steps.description: Casey inspects interactive elements for consistent chocolate theming.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over and click a button element.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Button has chocolate border and darkens slightly on hover, depresses on click.

requirement_tested: Package.json configured with `npm run install:all` to install both frontend and backend dependencies
user_persona: A new team member setting up the project for the first time.
user_goal: Install all necessary packages for both frontend and backend seamlessly.

narrative_steps.title: Running Install Script
narrative_steps.description: Devon clones the repo and runs the unified install command.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run install:all` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependencies are installed concurrently without errors.

requirement_tested: Package.json configured with `npm run dev` to start both frontend and backend concurrently
user_persona: A developer beginning daily work on the application.
user_goal: Start both frontend and backend servers with one command.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Morgan prepares to develop features requiring both client and server running.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` from the root project directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend starts on port 3000 and backend on port 3001 simultaneously using concurrently.

requirement_tested: API endpoints for retrieving restaurant data
user_persona: A frontend developer integrating restaurant data into the UI.
user_goal: Fetch restaurant data from backend to populate the UI.

narrative_steps.title: Calling Restaurant Listing Endpoint
narrative_steps.description: Developer makes an API call to retrieve all restaurants.
narrative_steps.action: Send GET request to `/api/restaurants`.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns JSON array of restaurant objects matching schema definition.

requirement_tested: API endpoints for retrieving recipe data
user_persona: A frontend developer building the recipe browsing feature.
user_goal: Retrieve recipe data to display in the recipe section.

narrative_steps.title: Fetching Recipe Data
narrative_steps.description: Developer requests detailed information about a specific recipe.
narrative_steps.action: Send GET request to `/api/recipes/{id}`.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns complete recipe object with ingredients, prep time, and other metadata.

requirement_tested: API endpoints for retrieving user reviews and ratings
user_persona: A frontend engineer implementing the review section.
user_goal: Display user-generated reviews and calculated ratings on detail pages.

narrative_steps.title: Getting Reviews for Target
narrative_steps.description: Engineer calls API to get all reviews associated with a restaurant.
narrative_steps.action: Send GET request to `/api/reviews?target_type=restaurant&target_id={uuid}`.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns list of review records linked to the specified restaurant ID.

requirement_tested: API endpoints for submitting new user reviews and ratings
user_persona: An authenticated user submitting feedback through the app.
user_goal: Post a new review and rating to share with other users.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting New Review
narrative_steps.description: User composes and sends a new review with valid authentication.
narrative_steps.action: Send POST request to `/api/reviews` with JWT in header and review payload.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server validates input, saves review to database, and responds with success confirmation.

requirement_tested: Responsive design compatible with modern browsers
user_persona: A mobile user accessing the app during lunch break.
user_goal: Use the app comfortably on a smartphone screen.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Layout Responsiveness
narrative_steps.description: Pat opens the app on a phone and browses different sections.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser window to simulate mobile viewport or use actual mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts smoothly with appropriate font sizing and component spacing.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Zoom Compatibility
narrative_steps.description: Pat increases text size to improve readability.
narrative_steps.action: Increase browser zoom level to 200%.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Text remains readable and controls stay accessible even at higher zoom levels.
